name: Tasmoyee Chowdhury
description: A nightowl by design, i think best when I'm fuelled by coffee and impossible standards.

name: Soushree Chakraborty
description: Fueled by curiosity and a love for new things, she dives headfirst into scientific discovery, artistic creation, and adrenaline-pumping adventures.

name: Adrija Majumder
description: Tumblr and black tea addict; hardcore Gibran enthusiast; probably nose-deep into a math book right now.

name: Ariona Talukdar
description: A quick learner with strong communication and problem-solving skills, she handles tasks with focus, clarity, and confidence.

name: Adrito Hazra
description: Hi I’m Adrito, a learner at heart with a strong interest in knowledge, creativity, and purpose-driven work. I believe small efforts can lead to meaningful change, and I enjoy working on ideas that educate, inspire, and help others. Growth, honesty, and empathy guide the way I live and learn.

name: Agnihotra Nath
description: Loves designing and being autistic. This car enthusiast does not miss when it comes to perfection, efficiency and speed.

name: Adiya Roy
description: A designer who can't let go of his lattes or his love for cars. A creator from birth, he's dabbled in illustration, graphic design, video editing, photography, and much more.

name: Adrito Hazra and Aryaka Sikdar
description: Researchers at The Carcino Foundation

name: Jiya Haldar
description: This marine biology enthusiast is an impeccable photographer and multitasking pro, known for her incredible writing skills.

name: Siran Pramanick
description: Hey there! I'm a young student hailing from Kolkata, India. My name means beauty, and perhaps that shows how I love to find beauty in literature, writing, music, art and history. I'm a fellow liberal arts enthusiast with a passion for writing, trying to change the world bit by bit with the power of words

name: Vaidehi Taneja
description: Guided by ambition and a restless mind, she immerses herself in problem-solving, meaningful creation, and challenges that test her limits.

name: Rishit Bhattacharya
description: your regular "jack of all trades"

name: Shruti Chowdhury
description: I possess strong communication skills and am a fast learner who remains highly focused on assigned tasks. I demonstrate effective leadership qualities and am devoted to my work, maintaining an always positive attitude while striving to achieve the best possible outcomes.

name: Shreya Anand
description: existence introduced being a superhuman, passion and craziness said LFG

name: Rishabh Das
description: Frontend Developer | AI/ML Engineer | Designer | STEM Enthusiast | Aspiring Data Scientist

name: Suditi Saha
description: A gifted writer with a sharp eye for detail, she brings a highly organized and efficient approach to every project. She is a quick learner with a deep passion for research, allowing her to tackle complex topics with ease.

name: Naitik Chattaraj
description: Codes like it's gravity. Fueled by caffeine and thinking in systems while dreaming in space. Leads devs, ships ideas, and refuses to believe bugs aren't just undocumented features.

name: Aryaka Sikdar
description: A researcher who balances equations and emotions with equal intensity. Juggling old Bollywood , curly hair routines, historical rabbit holes, and a lifelong habit of feeling everything a little too much.

name: Rajannya Das
description: A science enthusiast who's usually found lifting weights for peace, balancing deadlines with dopamine bike rides, travelling and learning languages. Mitosis deserves a standing ovation— biology said yes.

name: Biraja Pradhan Prasad
description: Hi! I'm a young student hailing from Kolkata, India. As a graphics designer, I love turning ideas into compelling visuals that communicate clearly and connect with people. My passion for piano and drama adds emotion and depth to my creative process, inspiring me to explore new perspectives and continuously grow through art and expression.

name: Hrilekha Sengupta
description: A genetics enthusiast with a fierce resilience determined to find the root cause to medical conditions way beyond her & advocating for social change bit-by-bit.

name: Siran Pramanick and Riddhima Saha
description: Researchers at The Carcino Foundation

name: Riddhima Saha
description: A student engaged in the process of self exploration, still unravelling the question of who she truly is.

name: Anjishnu Dey
description: Physicist by soul. Fights bugs, throws hands, hits gym. If it's complex, he's into it. If it's boring, he's out. Obsessed with clean design, clean lifts, and clean wins.

name: Ekoparnika Mukherjee
description: An author, poet, and dreamer who believes in the need for change- change that only come about via the efforts, passion, and love of Today's People. Science enthusiast, bookworm, and optimistic by nature.

name: Aashita Bakshi
description: I explore the science behind cancer with equal parts curiosity and conscience. At Carcino Foundation, I am willing to translate complex research into insights that can actually make a difference. When I’m not researching, you’ll find me on a mic—turning difficult ideas into intriguing conversations.

name: Nishka Majumder
description: A little forgetful, a little lost and a little too emotional. May get disheartened by failures but never stops reaching for success. Finds peace in music and poetry and her calm place is amongst noisy people she loves.
